name: Deus
description:
Deus' action takes place in the year 2165. The Alien World Exploration (AWE), a military organisation whose initial function was to explore unknown planets, now have full power. The AWE decided to create a new corporation to find and eliminate the most dangerous criminals. The DEUS were born. The term is a contraction of the phrase "Defend Us!", an advertising slogan used to encourage the Robinsons to enlist.

And You? You are Trepliev1, the famous Robinson, who allowed the AWE to take control. You are rapidly sidelined by the AWE who mistrust your unstable character. Longing for action and with finances extremely low, you decide to enlist as a Deus. You set off in search of the "Crusaders", the rewards for eliminating their members being the most attractive "on the market". From records which you pick up at Levattelow you discover that one of the terrorists, Diogenes49, was a former Robinson, and it was he who discovered the planet Alcibiade. You decide to go there, as discreetly as possible...
